p.text: This property is used to tune the balance of the movie played.

p.textAll: It helps to tune the panoram level between the left and right audio channels. Accepted values: 0-999 - left channel; 1000 - off; 1001-2000 - right channel. It is convenient to use this property for the track bar setting 2000 as maximum value of the property.

remarks.text: Values that are less than "0" and more than "2000" are regarded as invalid.
